name: GetPercentage
0:
”Alexa open get percentage”
”Alexa ask Get Percentage ten percent of one thousand two forty eight”
”Alexa ask get percentage what is the result of twenty percent of one twenty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get percentage
des: The "Get Percentage" Alexa Skill can be used to calculate discounts, taxes, tips or help you with homework as well. Just ask Alexa - What is result of twenty percent of one twenty and Alexa will calculate the difference between the original value and the percent to return the final result. Apart from that, you can also work with regular percentages by asking "thirty five percent of hundred thousand" to get the result. App icon designed by Flaticon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
